sentences:
Sentence 0:
The third group was also preconditioned, but the free radical scavenger N-2-mercaptopropionyl glycine (MPG 300 microM) was infused during the 10-min reperfusion and therefore was present in the myocardium in the distribution of the snared coronary artery during the entire reperfusion phase and also during the subsequent 30-min ischemia.
sentence_raw: The third group was also preconditioned, but the free radical scavenger N-2-mercaptopropionyl glycine (MPG 300 microM) was infused during the 10-min reperfusion and therefore was present in the myocardium in the distribution of the snared coronary artery during the entire reperfusion phase and also during the subsequent 30-min ischemia.
